name: Planet Explorer (GregKDev)
description:
Humanity has reached a technology that allowed them to travel across different galaxies. They are searching for new lands to live on, new resources and technologies.

You are controlling an armed robot to research recently discovered galaxy. Your role is to visit as many planets in the galaxy as you can, research them, gather resources and kill all the enemies you come across in your journey.

Game Features:

  • Top-Down-Shooter
  • Planetary environment
  • Tower Defence mechanics
  • Controller support
  • More on the way!

FAQ

Are you adding multiplayer feature?

I am currently working on completing and polishing the single player game-play. I can try to implement the multiplayer feature in the future, however, only in case of outstanding popularity.

Can I stream this game?

Yes! I really like to see other people play my games. Send me the link to your video so I can watch it.

This game is currently in the development. I appreciate any type of feedback and suggestions to make the game more enjoyable.
